This establishes the expected software system behavior, expressed in quantitative terms, at its boundary. For software, boundaries are commonly expressed in Application Program Interfaces (API) and a graphical user interface (GUI) or interface files or services, including data formats. Annex E (E.5) provides an interface management view of the life cycle processes. 2) Define the system/software requirements definition strategy.
